GE07mbh_10_u:000.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_10_u:001.001a: tatas te sahitā vīrāḥ prayātā dakṣiṇāmukhāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.002a: vimucya vāhāṃs tvaritā bhītāḥ samabhavaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:001.002c: gahanaṃ deśam āsādya pracchannā nyaviśanta te
GE07mbh_10_u:001.004a: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya pāṇḍavān anvacintayan
GE07mbh_10_u:001.004c: śrutvā ca ninadaṃ ghoraṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ jayaiṣiṇām
GE07mbh_10_u:001.005c: te muhūrtaṃ tato gatvā śrāntavāhāḥ pipāsitāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.007a: aśraddheyam idaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhīmena saṃjaya
GE07mbh_10_u:001.007c: yat sa nāgāyutaprāṇaḥ putro mama nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.008c: pāṇḍavaiḥ samare putro nihato mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_10_u:001.009a: na diṣṭam abhyatikrāntuṃ śakyaṃ gāvalgaṇe naraiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.009c: yat sametya raṇe pārthaiḥ putro mama nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.010c: hataṃ putraśataṃ śrutvā yan na dīrṇaṃ sahasradhā
GE07mbh_10_u:001.011c: na hy ahaṃ pāṇḍaveyasya viṣaye vastum utsahe
GE07mbh_10_u:001.012a: kathaṃ rājñaḥ pitā bhūtvā svayaṃ rājā ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_10_u:001.013a: ājñāpya pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ sthitvā mūrdhni ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_10_u:001.014a: kathaṃ bhīmasya vākyāni śrotuṃ śakṣyāmi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_10_u:001.014c: yena putraśataṃ pūrṇam ekena nihataṃ mama
GE07mbh_10_u:001.015a: kṛtaṃ satyaṃ vacas tasya vidurasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.015c: akurvatā vacas tena mama putreṇa saṃjaya
GE07mbh_10_u:001.016a: adharmeṇa hate tāta putre duryodhane mama
GE07mbh_10_u:001.016c: kṛtavarmā kṛpo drauṇiḥ kim akurvata saṃjaya
GE07mbh_10_u:001.017a: gatvā tu tāvakā rājan nātidūram avasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.018a: te muhūrtaṃ tu viśramya labdhatoyair hayottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.021a: praviśya tad vanaṃ ghoraṃ vīkṣamāṇāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.022a: upetya tu tadā rājan nyagrodhaṃ te mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.022c: dadṛśur dvipadāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ śreṣṭhaṃ taṃ vai vanaspatim
GE07mbh_10_u:001.023a: te 'vatīrya rathebhyas tu vipramucya ca vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.026a: īṣac cāpi pravalganti ye sattvā rātricāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.026c: divācarāś ca ye sattvās te nidrāvaśam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.027c: kravyādāś ca pramuditā ghorā prāptā ca śarvarī
GE07mbh_10_u:001.030c: śrameṇa sudṛḍhaṃ yuktā vikṣatā vividhaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.032c: naiva sma sa jagāmātha nidrāṃ sarpa iva śvasan
GE07mbh_10_u:001.033a: na lebhe sa tu nidrāṃ vai dahyamāno 'timanyunā
GE07mbh_10_u:001.033c: vīkṣāṃ cakre mahābāhus tad vanaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE07mbh_10_u:001.035c: sukhaṃ svapantaḥ kauravya pṛthak pṛthag apāśrayāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.038a: so 'tha śabdaṃ mṛduṃ kṛtvā līyamāna ivāṇḍajaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.038c: nyagrodhasya tataḥ śākhāṃ prārthayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_10_u:001.040a: keṣāṃ cid acchinat pakṣāñ śirāṃsi ca cakarta ha
GE07mbh_10_u:001.040c: caraṇāṃś caiva keṣāṃ cid babhañja caraṇāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.041a: kṣaṇenāhan sa balavān ye 'sya dṛṣṭipathe sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.041c: teṣāṃ śarīrāvayavaiḥ śarīraiś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_10_u:001.042a: tāṃs tu hatvā tataḥ kākān kauśiko mudito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_10_u:001.043a: tad dṛṣṭvā sopadhaṃ karma kauśikena kṛtaṃ niśi
GE07mbh_10_u:001.044c: śatrūṇāṃ kṣapaṇe yuktaḥ prāptakālaś ca me mataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.045a: nādya śakyā mayā hantuṃ pāṇḍavā jitakāśinaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.045e: rājñaḥ sakāśe teṣāṃ ca pratijñāto vadho mayā
GE07mbh_10_u:001.046e: chadmanā tu bhavet siddhiḥ śatrūṇāṃ ca kṣayo mahān
GE07mbh_10_u:001.047a: tatra saṃśayitād arthād yo 'rtho niḥsaṃśayo bhavet
GE07mbh_10_u:001.048a: yac cāpy atra bhaved vācyaṃ garhitaṃ lokaninditam
GE07mbh_10_u:001.049a: ninditāni ca sarvāṇi kutsitāni pade pade
GE07mbh_10_u:001.050a: asminn arthe purā gītau śrūyete dharmacintakaiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.051a: pariśrānte vidīrṇe ca bhuñjāne cāpi śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.051c: prasthāne ca praveśe ca prahartavyaṃ ripor balam
GE07mbh_10_u:001.052c: bhinnayodhaṃ balaṃ yac ca dvidhā yuktaṃ ca yad bhavet
GE07mbh_10_u:001.052c-0005_01: na śatrughāte vidvadbhir dharmo draṣṭavya ity uta
GE07mbh_10_u:001.052c-0005_02: yena kena prakāreṇa ripuṃ hanyāt tad ācaret
GE07mbh_10_u:001.052c-0005_03: na ca vadhyaḥ kadā cid dhi ripur nyāyam avekṣatā
GE07mbh_10_u:001.052c-0005_04: yadi śakyo bhavet kaś cic chettum āmūlato ripuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.052c-0005_05: tatra yatnaḥ prakartavyas tasya siddhir bhaved yathā
GE07mbh_10_u:001.053a: ity evaṃ niścayaṃ cakre suptānāṃ yudhi māraṇe
GE07mbh_10_u:001.054a: sa krūrāṃ matim āsthāya viniścitya muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.054c: suptau prābodhayat tau tu mātulaṃ bhojam eva ca
GE07mbh_10_u:001.055a: nottaraṃ pratipede ca tatra yuktaṃ hriyā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.055c: sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā bāṣpavihvalam abravīt
GE07mbh_10_u:001.056c: yasyārthe vairam asmābhir āsaktaṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_10_u:001.059a: vinardanti sma pāñcālāḥ kṣveḍanti ca hasanti ca
GE07mbh_10_u:001.059c: dhamanti śaṅkhāñ śataśo hṛṣṭā ghnanti ca dundubhīn
GE07mbh_10_u:001.061c: siṃhanādaś ca śūrāṇāṃ śrūyate sumahān ayam
GE07mbh_10_u:001.062a: diśaṃ prācīṃ samāśritya hṛṣṭānāṃ garjatāṃ bhṛśam
GE07mbh_10_u:001.063a: pāṇḍavair dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ yad idaṃ kadanaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_10_u:001.063c: vayam eva trayaḥ śiṣṭās tasmin mahati vaiśase
GE07mbh_10_u:001.064a: ke cin nāgaśataprāṇāḥ ke cit sarvāstrakovidāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.064c: nihatāḥ pāṇḍaveyaiḥ sma manye kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_10_u:001.065a: evam etena bhāvyaṃ hi nūnaṃ kāryeṇa tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:001.065c: yathā hy asyedṛśī niṣṭhā kṛte kārye 'pi duṣkare
GE07mbh_10_u:001.066a: bhavatos tu yadi prajñā na mohād apacīyate
GE07mbh_10_u:001.066c: vyāpanne 'smin mahaty arthe yan naḥ śreyas tad ucyatām
GE07mbh_10_u:002.001a: śrutaṃ te vacanaṃ sarvaṃ hetuyuktaṃ mayā vibho
GE07mbh_10_u:002.001c: mamāpi tu vacaḥ kiṃ cic chṛṇuṣvādya mahābhuja
GE07mbh_10_u:002.002a: ābaddhā mānuṣāḥ sarve nirbandhāḥ karmaṇor dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.002c: daive puruṣakāre ca paraṃ tābhyāṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_10_u:002.003a: na hi daivena sidhyanti karmāṇy ekena sattama
GE07mbh_10_u:002.003c: na cāpi karmaṇaikena dvābhyāṃ siddhis tu yogataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.004a: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ sarvārthā nibaddhā hy adhamottamāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.004c: pravṛttāś caiva dṛśyante nivṛttāś caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.004c-0007_01: na vā puruṣakāreṇa saṃsiddhiś caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.005a: parjanyaḥ parvate varṣan kiṃ nu sādhayate phalam
GE07mbh_10_u:002.005c: kṛṣṭe kṣetre tathāvarṣan kiṃ nu sādhayate phalam
GE07mbh_10_u:002.006a: utthānaṃ cāpy adaivasya hy anutthānasya daivatam
GE07mbh_10_u:002.006c: vyarthaṃ bhavati sarvatra pūrvaṃ kas tatra niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.007a: pravṛṣṭe ca yathā deve samyak kṣetre ca karṣite
GE07mbh_10_u:002.007c: bījaṃ mahāguṇaṃ bhūyāt tathā siddhir hi mānuṣī
GE07mbh_10_u:002.008c: prājñāḥ puruṣakāraṃ tu ghaṭante dākṣyam āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.009a: tābhyāṃ sarve hi kāryārthā manuṣyāṇāṃ nararṣabha
GE07mbh_10_u:002.009c: viceṣṭantaś ca dṛśyante nivṛttāś ca tathaiva hi
GE07mbh_10_u:002.010a: kṛtaḥ puruṣakāraḥ san so 'pi daivena sidhyati
GE07mbh_10_u:002.011c: aphalaṃ dṛśyate loke samyag apy upapāditam
GE07mbh_10_u:002.012c: utthānaṃ te vigarhanti prājñānāṃ tan na rocate
GE07mbh_10_u:002.013a: prāyaśo hi kṛtaṃ karma aphalaṃ dṛśyate bhuvi
GE07mbh_10_u:002.013c: akṛtvā ca punar duḥkhaṃ karma dṛśyen mahāphalam
GE07mbh_10_u:002.014a: ceṣṭām akurvaṃl labhate yadi kiṃ cid yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_10_u:002.014c: yo vā na labhate kṛtvā durdaśau tāv ubhāv api
GE07mbh_10_u:002.015a: śaknoti jīvituṃ dakṣo nālasaḥ sukham edhate
GE07mbh_10_u:002.016a: yadi dakṣaḥ samārambhāt karmaṇāṃ nāśnute phalam
GE07mbh_10_u:002.016c: nāsya vācyaṃ bhavet kiṃ cit tattvaṃ cāpy adhigacchati
GE07mbh_10_u:002.017a: akṛtvā karma yo loke phalaṃ vindati viṣṭitaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.017c: sa tu vaktavyatāṃ yāti dveṣyo bhavati prāyaśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.018a: evam etad anādṛtya vartate yas tv ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_10_u:002.018c: sa karoty ātmano 'narthān naiṣa buddhimatāṃ nayaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.019a: hīnaṃ puruṣakāreṇa yadā daivena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.019e: hīnaṃ puruṣakāreṇa karma tv iha na sidhyati
GE07mbh_10_u:002.020a: daivatebhyo namaskṛtya yas tv arthān samyag īhate
GE07mbh_10_u:002.020c: dakṣo dākṣiṇyasaṃpanno na sa moghaṃ vihanyate
GE07mbh_10_u:002.021a: samyag īhā punar iyaṃ yo vṛddhān upasevate
GE07mbh_10_u:002.021c: āpṛcchati ca yac chreyaḥ karoti ca hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.022c: te 'sya yoge paraṃ mūlaṃ tanmūlā siddhir ucyate
GE07mbh_10_u:002.023a: vṛddhānāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā yo hy utthānaṃ prayojayet
GE07mbh_10_u:002.023c: utthānasya phalaṃ samyak tadā sa labhate 'cirāt
GE07mbh_10_u:002.024a: rāgāt krodhād bhayāl lobhād yo 'rthān īheta mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.024c: anīśaś cāvamānī ca sa śīghraṃ bhraśyate śriyaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.027a: pūrvam apy atiduḥśīlo na dainyaṃ kartum arhati
GE07mbh_10_u:002.027c: tapaty arthe vipanne hi mitrāṇām akṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.028a: anvāvartāmahi vayaṃ yat tu taṃ pāpapūruṣam
GE07mbh_10_u:002.028c: asmān apy anayas tasmāt prāpto 'yaṃ dāruṇo mahān
GE07mbh_10_u:002.029c: buddhiś cintayataḥ kiṃ cit svaṃ śreyo nāvabudhyate
GE07mbh_10_u:002.030a: muhyatā tu manuṣyeṇa praṣṭavyāḥ suhṛdo budhāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.030a-0008_01: tatrāsya buddhir vinayas tatra śreyaś ca paśyati
GE07mbh_10_u:002.030a-0008_02: tato 'sya mūlaṃ kāryāṇāṃ buddhyā niścitya vai budhāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.030c: te ca pṛṣṭā yathā brūyus tat kartavyaṃ tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_10_u:002.031a: te vayaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca gāndhārīṃ ca sametya ha
GE07mbh_10_u:002.032a: te pṛṣṭāś ca vadeyur yac chreyo naḥ samanantaram
GE07mbh_10_u:002.032c: tad asmābhiḥ punaḥ kāryam iti me naiṣṭhikī matiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:002.033a: anārambhāt tu kāryāṇāṃ nārthaḥ saṃpadyate kva cit
GE07mbh_10_u:002.033c: kṛte puruṣakāre ca yeṣāṃ kāryaṃ na sidhyati
GE07mbh_10_u:002.033e: daivenopahatās te tu nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_10_u:003.002c: krūraṃ manas tataḥ kṛtvā tāv ubhau pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_10_u:003.003a: puruṣe puruṣe buddhiḥ sā sā bhavati śobhanā
GE07mbh_10_u:003.003c: tuṣyanti ca pṛthak sarve prajñayā te svayā svayā
GE07mbh_10_u:003.004a: sarvo hi manyate loka ātmānaṃ buddhimattaram
GE07mbh_10_u:003.005a: sarvasya hi svakā prajñā sādhuvāde pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_10_u:003.005c: parabuddhiṃ ca nindanti svāṃ praśaṃsanti cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_10_u:003.006c: te 'nyonyena ca tuṣyanti bahu manyanti cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_10_u:003.007a: tasyaiva tu manuṣyasya sā sā buddhis tadā tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:003.008c: cittavaikalyam āsādya sā sā buddhiḥ prajāyate
GE07mbh_10_u:003.009a: yathā hi vaidyaḥ kuśalo jñātvā vyādhiṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_10_u:003.010a: evaṃ kāryasya yogārthaṃ buddhiṃ kurvanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:003.010c: prajñayā hi svayā yuktās tāṃ ca nindanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:003.011a: anyayā yauvane martyo buddhyā bhavati mohitaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:003.011c: madhye 'nyayā jarāyāṃ tu so 'nyāṃ rocayate matim
GE07mbh_10_u:003.012a: vyasanaṃ vā punar ghoraṃ samṛddhiṃ vāpi tādṛśīm
GE07mbh_10_u:003.013a: ekasminn eva puruṣe sā sā buddhis tadā tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:003.013c: bhavaty anityaprajñatvāt sā tasyaiva na rocate
GE07mbh_10_u:003.014a: niścitya tu yathāprajñaṃ yāṃ matiṃ sādhu paśyati
GE07mbh_10_u:003.015a: sarvo hi puruṣo bhoja sādhv etad iti niścitaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:003.016a: sarve hi yuktiṃ vijñāya prajñāṃ cāpi svakāṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:003.016c: ceṣṭante vividhāś ceṣṭā hitam ity eva jānate
GE07mbh_10_u:003.017a: upajātā vyasanajā yeyam adya matir mama
GE07mbh_10_u:003.018a: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā karma tāsu vidhāya ca
GE07mbh_10_u:003.019a: brāhmaṇe damam avyagraṃ kṣatriye teja uttamam
GE07mbh_10_u:003.019c: dākṣyaṃ vaiśye ca śūdre ca sarvavarṇānukūlatām
GE07mbh_10_u:003.020c: adakṣo nindyate vaiśyaḥ śūdraś ca pratikūlavān
GE07mbh_10_u:003.021a: so 'smi jātaḥ kule śreṣṭhe brāhmaṇānāṃ supūjite
GE07mbh_10_u:003.022c: prakuryāṃ sumahat karma na me tat sādhu saṃmatam
GE07mbh_10_u:003.023a: dhārayitvā dhanur divyaṃ divyāny astrāṇi cāhave
GE07mbh_10_u:003.023c: pitaraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi saṃsadi
GE07mbh_10_u:003.024a: so 'ham adya yathākāmaṃ kṣatradharmam upāsya tam
GE07mbh_10_u:003.024c: gantāsmi padavīṃ rājñaḥ pituś cāpi mahādyuteḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:003.025e: vayaṃ jitā matāś caiṣāṃ śrāntā vyāyam anena ca
GE07mbh_10_u:003.026a: teṣāṃ niśi prasuptānāṃ svasthānāṃ śibire svake
GE07mbh_10_u:003.028e: nihatya caiva pāñcālāñ śāntiṃ labdhāsmi sattama
GE07mbh_10_u:003.029c: pinākapāṇiḥ saṃkruddhaḥ svayaṃ rudraḥ paśuṣv iva
GE07mbh_10_u:003.030a: adyāhaṃ sarvapāñcālān nihatya ca nikṛtya ca
GE07mbh_10_u:003.030a-0010_01: gamiṣyāmy atha pañcānāṃ padavīm adya durgamām
GE07mbh_10_u:003.033c: virātre pramathiṣyāmi paśor iva śiro balāt
GE07mbh_10_u:003.035a: adya pāñcālasenāṃ tāṃ nihatya niśi sauptike
GE07mbh_10_u:004.001a: diṣṭyā te pratikartavye matir jāteyam acyuta
GE07mbh_10_u:004.001c: na tvā vārayituṃ śakto vajrapāṇir api svayam
GE07mbh_10_u:004.002a: anuyāsyāvahe tvāṃ tu prabhāte sahitāv ubhau
GE07mbh_10_u:004.003a: ahaṃ tvām anuyāsyāmi kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.003c: parān abhimukhaṃ yāntaṃ rathāv āsthāya daṃśitau
GE07mbh_10_u:004.004a: āvābhyāṃ sahitaḥ śatrūñ śvo 'si hantā samāgame
GE07mbh_10_u:004.005a: śaktas tvam asi vikrāntuṃ viśramasva niśām imām
GE07mbh_10_u:004.005c: ciraṃ te jāgratas tāta svapa tāvan niśām imām
GE07mbh_10_u:004.006a: viśrāntaś ca vinidraś ca svasthacittaś ca mānada
GE07mbh_10_u:004.006c: sametya samare śatrūn vadhiṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.007a: na hi tvā rathināṃ śreṣṭha pragṛhītavarāyudham
GE07mbh_10_u:004.007c: jetum utsahate kaś cid api deveṣu pāvakiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.008a: kṛpeṇa sahitaṃ yāntaṃ yuktaṃ ca kṛtavarmaṇā
GE07mbh_10_u:004.008c: ko drauṇiṃ yudhi saṃrabdhaṃ yodhayed api devarāṭ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.010a: tava hy astrāṇi divyāni mama caiva na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.011a: te vayaṃ sahitās tāta sarvāñ śatrūn samāgatān
GE07mbh_10_u:004.011c: prasahya samare hatvā prītiṃ prāpsyāma puṣkalām
GE07mbh_10_u:004.011e: viśramasva tvam avyagraḥ svapa cemāṃ niśāṃ sukham
GE07mbh_10_u:004.012a: ahaṃ ca kṛtavarmā ca prayāntaṃ tvāṃ narottama
GE07mbh_10_u:004.012e: rathinaṃ tvarayā yāntaṃ rathāv āsthāya daṃśitau
GE07mbh_10_u:004.013a: sa gatvā śibiraṃ teṣāṃ nāma viśrāvya cāhave
GE07mbh_10_u:004.013c: tataḥ kartāsi śatrūṇāṃ yudhyatāṃ kadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_10_u:004.014a: kṛtvā ca kadanaṃ teṣāṃ prabhāte vimale 'hani
GE07mbh_10_u:004.015a: tvaṃ hi śakto raṇe jetuṃ pāñcālānāṃ varūthinīm
GE07mbh_10_u:004.016a: mayā tvāṃ sahitaṃ saṃkhye guptaṃ ca kṛtavarmaṇā
GE07mbh_10_u:004.016c: na saheta vibhuḥ sākṣād vajrapāṇir api svayam
GE07mbh_10_u:004.017a: na cāhaṃ samare tāta kṛtavarmā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_10_u:004.017c: anirjitya raṇe pāṇḍūn vyapayāsyāva karhi cit
GE07mbh_10_u:004.018a: hatvā ca samare kṣudrān pāñcālān pāṇḍubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_10_u:004.018c: nivartiṣyāmahe sarve hatā vā svargagā vayam
GE07mbh_10_u:004.019a: sarvopāyaiḥ sahāyās te prabhāte vayam eva hi
GE07mbh_10_u:004.020a: evam uktas tato drauṇir mātulena hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.020c: abravīn mātulaṃ rājan krodhād udvṛtya locane
GE07mbh_10_u:004.021c: arthāṃś cintayataś cāpi kāmayānasya vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.022a: tad idaṃ samanuprāptaṃ paśya me 'dya catuṣṭayam
GE07mbh_10_u:004.022c: yasya bhāgaś caturtho me svapnam ahnāya nāśayet
GE07mbh_10_u:004.023a: kiṃ nāma duḥkhaṃ loke 'smin pitur vadham anusmaran
GE07mbh_10_u:004.023c: hṛdayaṃ nirdahan me 'dya rātryahāni na śāmyati
GE07mbh_10_u:004.024a: yathā ca nihataḥ pāpaiḥ pitā mama viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.024c: pratyakṣam api te sarvaṃ tan me marmāṇi kṛntati
GE07mbh_10_u:004.025a: kathaṃ hi mādṛśo loke muhūrtam api jīvati
GE07mbh_10_u:004.025c: droṇo hateti yad vācaḥ pāñcālānāṃ śṛṇomy aham
GE07mbh_10_u:004.026c: sa me pitṛvadhād vadhyaḥ pāñcālā ye ca saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.027a: vilāpo bhagnasakthasya yas tu rājño mayā śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.027c: sa punar hṛdayaṃ kasya krūrasyāpi na nirdahet
GE07mbh_10_u:004.028a: kasya hy akaruṇasyāpi netrābhyām aśru nāvrajet
GE07mbh_10_u:004.028c: nṛpater bhagnasakthasya śrutvā tādṛg vacaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.029a: yaś cāyaṃ mitrapakṣo me mayi jīvati nirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.029c: śokaṃ me vardhayaty eṣa vārivega ivārṇavam
GE07mbh_10_u:004.029e: ekāgramanaso me 'dya kuto nidrā kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_10_u:004.031a: na cāsmi śakyaḥ saṃyantum asmāt kāryāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_10_u:004.031c: na taṃ paśyāmi loke 'smin yo māṃ kāryān nivartayet
GE07mbh_10_u:004.031e: iti me niścitā buddhir eṣā sādhumatā ca me
GE07mbh_10_u:004.032a: vārttikaiḥ kathyamānas tu mitrāṇāṃ me parābhavaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:004.032c: pāṇḍavānāṃ ca vijayo hṛdayaṃ dahatīva me
GE07mbh_10_u:004.033a: ahaṃ tu kadanaṃ kṛtvā śatrūṇām adya sauptike
GE07mbh_10_u:004.033c: tato viśramitā caiva svaptā ca vigatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.001c: nālaṃ vedayituṃ kṛtsnau dharmārthāv iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.002a: tathaiva tāvan medhāvī vinayaṃ yo na śikṣati
GE07mbh_10_u:005.002c: na ca kiṃ cana jānāti so 'pi dharmārthaniścayam
GE07mbh_10_u:005.002c-0014_01: ciraṃ hy api jaḍaḥ śūraḥ paṇḍitaṃ paryupāsya ha
GE07mbh_10_u:005.002c-0014_02: na sa dharmān vijānāti darvī sūparasān iva
GE07mbh_10_u:005.002c-0014_03: muhūrtam api taṃ prājñaḥ paṇḍitaṃ paryupāsya ha
GE07mbh_10_u:005.002c-0014_04: kṣipraṃ dharmān vijānāti jihvā sūparasān iva
GE07mbh_10_u:005.003a: śuśrūṣus tv eva medhāvī puruṣo niyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.003c: jānīyād āgamān sarvān grāhyaṃ ca na virodhayet
GE07mbh_10_u:005.004a: aneyas tv avamānī yo durātmā pāpapūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.006a: yathā hy uccāvacair vākyaiḥ kṣiptacitto niyamyate
GE07mbh_10_u:005.006c: tathaiva suhṛdā śakyo naśakyas tv avasīdati
GE07mbh_10_u:005.007a: tathaiva suhṛdaṃ prājñaṃ kurvāṇaṃ karma pāpakam
GE07mbh_10_u:005.008a: sa kalyāṇe matiṃ kṛtvā niyamyātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_10_u:005.008c: kuru me vacanaṃ tāta yena paścān na tapyase
GE07mbh_10_u:005.009a: na vadhaḥ pūjyate loke suptānām iha dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.010a: ye ca brūyus tavāsmīti ye ca syuḥ śaraṇāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.010c: vimuktamūrdhajā ye ca ye cāpi hatavāhanāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.011c: viśvastā rajanīṃ sarve pretā iva vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.012c: vyaktaṃ sa narake majjed agādhe vipule 'plave
GE07mbh_10_u:005.013a: sarvāstraviduṣāṃ loke śreṣṭhas tvam asi viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.013c: na ca te jātu loke 'smin susūkṣmam api kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_10_u:005.014a: tvaṃ punaḥ sūryasaṃkāśaḥ śvobhūta udite ravau
GE07mbh_10_u:005.015c: śukle raktam iva nyastaṃ bhaved iti matir mama
GE07mbh_10_u:005.016a: evam etad yathāttha tvam anuśāsmīha mātula
GE07mbh_10_u:005.016c: tais tu pūrvamayaṃ setuḥ śatadhā vidalīkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.018a: karṇaś ca patite cakre rathasya rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.021a: duryodhanaś ca bhīmena sametya gadayā mṛdhe
GE07mbh_10_u:005.023a: vilāpo bhagnasakthasya yo me rājñaḥ pariśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.023c: vārttikānāṃ kathayatāṃ sa me marmāṇi kṛntati
GE07mbh_10_u:005.024c: tān evaṃ bhinnamaryādān kiṃ bhavān na vigarhati
GE07mbh_10_u:005.024c-0015_01: yāsyāmy apacitiṃ rājñaḥ kauravasya pitus tathā
GE07mbh_10_u:005.025a: pitṛhantṝn ahaṃ hatvā pāñcālān niśi sauptike
GE07mbh_10_u:005.025c: kāmaṃ kīṭaḥ pataṃgo vā janma prāpya bhavāmi vai
GE07mbh_10_u:005.026a: tvare cāham anenādya yad idaṃ me cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_10_u:005.026c: tasya me tvaramāṇasya kuto nidrā kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_10_u:005.027a: na sa jātaḥ pumāṃl loke kaś cin na ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_10_u:005.027c: yo me vyāvartayed etāṃ vadhe teṣāṃ kṛtāṃ matim
GE07mbh_10_u:005.029c: kim ayaṃ syandano yuktaḥ kiṃ ca kāryaṃ cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_10_u:005.030a: ekasārthaṃ prayātau svas tvayā saha nararṣabha
GE07mbh_10_u:005.031a: aśvatthāmā tu saṃkruddhaḥ pitur vadham anusmaran
GE07mbh_10_u:005.033a: taṃ tathaiva haniṣyāmi nyastavarmāṇam adya vai
GE07mbh_10_u:005.034a: kathaṃ ca nihataḥ pāpaḥ pāñcālaḥ paśuvan mayā
GE07mbh_10_u:005.034c: śastrāhavajitāṃ lokān prāpnuyād iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.036a: ity uktvā ratham āsthāya prāyād abhimukhaḥ parān
GE07mbh_10_u:005.036c: tam anvagāt kṛpo rājan kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.037a: te prayātā vyarocanta parān abhimukhās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:005.038a: yayuś ca śibiraṃ teṣāṃ saṃprasuptajanaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_10_u:005.038c: dvāradeśaṃ tu saṃprāpya drauṇis tasthau rathottame saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_10_u:005.038c-0016_02: niścitau tu vadhe teṣāṃ pāñcālānāṃ mahāvratau
GE07mbh_10_u:005.038c-0016_05: tāvat kāryam idaṃ yuktaṃ sādhayāmy aham añjasā
GE07mbh_10_u:005.038c-0016_06: evaṃ tu saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā ekamūrtidharau sthitau 10,006.001<>dhṛtarāṣṭra
GE07mbh_10_u:006.001a: dvāradeśe tato drauṇim avasthitam avekṣya tau
GE07mbh_10_u:006.001c: akurvatāṃ bhojakṛpau kiṃ saṃjaya vadasva me
GE07mbh_10_u:006.002a: kṛtavarmāṇam āmantrya kṛpaṃ ca sa mahāratham
GE07mbh_10_u:006.007a: naiva tasya vapuḥ śakyaṃ pravaktuṃ veṣa eva vā
GE07mbh_10_u:006.007c: sarvathā tu tad ālakṣya sphuṭeyur api parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:006.008a: tasyāsyān nāsikābhyāṃ ca śravaṇābhyāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:006.011a: drauṇimuktāñ śarāṃs tāṃs tu tad bhūtaṃ mahad agrasat
GE07mbh_10_u:006.011c-0017_01: agrasat tāṃs tathā bhūtaṃ drauṇinā prahitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_10_u:006.012a: aśvatthāmā tu saṃprekṣya tāñ śaraughān nirarthakān
GE07mbh_10_u:006.013c: yugānte sūryam āhatya maholkeva divaś cyutā
GE07mbh_10_u:006.015a: tataḥ khaḍgavaraṃ dhīmān bhūtāya prāhiṇot tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:006.015c: sa tadāsādya bhūtaṃ vai vilayaṃ tūlavad yayau
GE07mbh_10_u:006.016a: tataḥ sa kupito drauṇir indraketunibhāṃ gadām
GE07mbh_10_u:006.016c: jvalantīṃ prāhiṇot tasmai bhūtaṃ tām api cāgrasat
GE07mbh_10_u:006.019a: bruvatām apriyaṃ pathyaṃ suhṛdāṃ na śṛṇoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:006.019c: sa śocaty āpadaṃ prāpya yathāham ativartya tau
GE07mbh_10_u:006.020c: sa pathaḥ pracyuto dharmyāt kupathaṃ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_10_u:006.022c: ity evaṃ gurubhiḥ pūrvam upadiṣṭaṃ nṛṇāṃ sadā
GE07mbh_10_u:006.024c: yad udyamya mahat kṛtyaṃ bhayād api nivartate
GE07mbh_10_u:006.025a: aśakyaṃ caiva kaḥ kartuṃ śaktaḥ śaktibalād iha
GE07mbh_10_u:006.025c: na hi daivād garīyo vai mānuṣaṃ karma kathyate
GE07mbh_10_u:006.026a: mānuṣaṃ kurvataḥ karma yadi daivān na sidhyati
GE07mbh_10_u:006.026c: sa pathaḥ pracyuto dharmyād vipadaṃ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_10_u:006.027c: yad ārabhya kriyāṃ kāṃ cid bhayād iha nivartate
GE07mbh_10_u:006.028a: tad idaṃ duṣpraṇītena bhayaṃ māṃ samupasthitam
GE07mbh_10_u:006.028c: na hi droṇasutaḥ saṃkhye nivarteta kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_10_u:006.029a: idaṃ ca sumahad bhūtaṃ daivadaṇḍam ivodyatam
GE07mbh_10_u:006.029c: na caitad abhijānāmi cintayann api sarvathā
GE07mbh_10_u:006.030a: dhruvaṃ yeyam adharme me pravṛttā kaluṣā matiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:006.030c: tasyāḥ phalam idaṃ ghoraṃ pratighātāya dṛśyate
GE07mbh_10_u:006.031a: tad idaṃ daivavihitaṃ mama saṃkhye nivartanam
GE07mbh_10_u:006.031c: nānyatra daivād udyantum iha śakyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_10_u:006.032a: so 'ham adya mahādevaṃ prapadye śaraṇaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_10_u:006.032c: daivadaṇḍam imaṃ ghoraṃ sa hi me nāśayiṣyati
GE07mbh_10_u:006.034a: sa hi devo 'tyagād devāṃs tapasā vikrameṇa ca
GE07mbh_10_u:007.001a: sa evaṃ cintayitvā tu droṇaputro viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_10_u:007.002a: ugraṃ sthāṇuṃ śivaṃ rudraṃ śarvam īśānam īśvaram
GE07mbh_10_u:007.002c: giriśaṃ varadaṃ devaṃ bhavaṃ bhāvanam avyayam
GE07mbh_10_u:007.003a: śitikaṇṭham ajaṃ śakraṃ krathaṃ kratuharaṃ haram
GE07mbh_10_u:007.007a: śukraṃ viśvasṛjaṃ brahma brahmacāriṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_10_u:007.010a: paraṃ parebhyaḥ paramaṃ paraṃ yasmān na vidyate
GE07mbh_10_u:007.012a: imāṃ cāpy āpadaṃ ghorāṃ tarāmy adya sudustarām
GE07mbh_10_u:007.013a: iti tasya vyavasitaṃ jñātvā tyāgātmakaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:007.014a: tasyāṃ vedyāṃ tadā rājaṃś citrabhānur ajāyata
GE07mbh_10_u:007.014c: dyāṃ diśo vidiśaḥ khaṃ ca jvālābhir abhipūrayan
GE07mbh_10_u:007.018a-0019_01: śataśaś ca sahasrākṣās tathaiva ca ghaṭodarāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:007.021a: nirmāṃsāḥ kokavaktrāś ca śyenavaktrāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_10_u:007.023a: śaṅkhābhāḥ śaṅkhavaktrāś ca śaṅkhakarṇās tathaiva ca 10,007.023c<>śaṅkhamālāparikarāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:007.030c: nīlāṅgāḥ kamalāṅgāś ca muṇḍavaktrās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_10_u:007.032c: laṅghayantaḥ plavantaś ca valgantaś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:007.033c: mattā iva mahānāgā vinadanto muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:007.039a: utsaheraṃś ca ye hantuṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidham
GE07mbh_10_u:007.039c: ye ca vītabhayā nityaṃ harasya bhrukuṭībhaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:007.041a: prāpyāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryaṃ ye na yānti ca vismayam
GE07mbh_10_u:007.041c: yeṣāṃ vismayate nityaṃ bhagavān karmabhir haraḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:007.042a: manovākkarmabhir bhaktair nityam ārādhitaś ca yaiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:007.043a: pibanto 'sṛgvasās tv anye kruddhā brahmadviṣāṃ sadā
GE07mbh_10_u:007.043c: caturviṃśātmakaṃ somaṃ ye pibanti ca nityadā
GE07mbh_10_u:007.044a: śrutena brahmacaryeṇa tapasā ca damena ca
GE07mbh_10_u:007.045a: yair ātmabhūtair bhagavān pārvatyā ca maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:007.049a: janayeyur bhayaṃ ye sma trailokyasyāpi darśanāt
GE07mbh_10_u:007.049c: tān prekṣamāṇo 'pi vyathāṃ na cakāra mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:007.051a: dhanūṃṣi samidhas tatra pavitrāṇi śitāḥ śarāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:007.051c: havir ātmavataś cātmā tasmin bhārata karmaṇi
GE07mbh_10_u:007.053a: taṃ rudraṃ raudrakarmāṇaṃ raudraiḥ karmabhir acyutam
GE07mbh_10_u:007.054a: imam ātmānam adyāhaṃ jātam āṅgirase kule
GE07mbh_10_u:007.054c: agnau juhomi bhagavan pratigṛhṇīṣva māṃ balim
GE07mbh_10_u:007.056a: tvayi sarvāṇi bhūtāni sarvabhūteṣu cāsi vai
GE07mbh_10_u:007.056c: guṇānāṃ hi pradhānānām ekatvaṃ tvayi tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_10_u:007.057c: pratigṛhāṇa māṃ deva yady aśakyāḥ pare mayā
GE07mbh_10_u:007.058a: ity uktvā drauṇir āsthāya tāṃ vedīṃ dīptapāvakām
GE07mbh_10_u:007.059a: tam ūrdhvabāhuṃ niśceṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā havir upasthitam
GE07mbh_10_u:007.059c: abravīd bhagavān sākṣān mahādevo hasann iva
GE07mbh_10_u:007.060c: kṣāntyā bhaktyā ca dhṛtyā ca buddhyā ca vacasā tathā
GE07mbh_10_u:007.061c: tasmād iṣṭatamaḥ kṛṣṇād anyo mama na vidyate
GE07mbh_10_u:007.062a: kurvatā tasya saṃmānaṃ tvāṃ ca jijñāsatā mayā
GE07mbh_10_u:007.062c: pāñcālāḥ sahasā guptā māyāś ca bahuśaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:007.063a: kṛtas tasyaiṣa saṃmānaḥ pāñcālān rakṣatā mayā
GE07mbh_10_u:007.063c: abhibhūtās tu kālena naiṣām adyāsti jīvitam
GE07mbh_10_u:007.064a: evam uktvā maheṣvāsaṃ bhagavān ātmanas tanum
GE07mbh_10_u:007.064c: āviveśa dadau cāsmai vimalaṃ khaḍgam uttamam
GE07mbh_10_u:007.066a: tam adṛśyāni bhūtāni rakṣāṃsi ca samādravan
GE07mbh_10_u:007.066e-0024_01: yaś cedaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ śrutvā bhaktisamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.001c: kaccit kṛpaś ca bhojaś ca bhayārtau na nyavartatām
GE07mbh_10_u:008.002a: kaccin na vāritau kṣudrai rakṣibhir nopalakṣitau

GE07mbh_10_u:008.003c-0027_01: gatvā tiṣṭhaty asau drauṇiḥ kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_10_u:008.004a: pāñcālair vā vinihatau kaccin nāsvapatāṃ kṣitau
GE07mbh_10_u:008.004c: kaccit tābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ karma tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_10_u:008.005c: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca śibiradvāry atiṣṭhatām
GE07mbh_10_u:008.006a: aśvatthāmā tu tau dṛṣṭvā yatnavantau mahārathau
GE07mbh_10_u:008.006c: prahṛṣṭaḥ śanakai rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_10_u:008.008a: ahaṃ pravekṣye śibiraṃ cariṣyāmi ca kālavat
GE07mbh_10_u:008.008c: yathā na kaś cid api me jīvan mucyeta mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.008c-0028_01: tathā bhavadbhyāṃ kāryaṃ syād iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.009a: ity uktvā prāviśad drauṇiḥ pārthānāṃ śibiraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_10_u:008.010a: sa praviśya mahābāhur uddeśajñaś ca tasya ha
GE07mbh_10_u:008.011a: te tu kṛtvā mahat karma śrāntāś ca balavad raṇe
GE07mbh_10_u:008.012a: atha praviśya tad veśma dhṛṣṭadyumnasya bhārata
GE07mbh_10_u:008.012c: pāñcālyaṃ śayane drauṇir apaśyat suptam antikāt
GE07mbh_10_u:008.017a: sa balāt tena niṣpiṣṭaḥ sādhvasena ca bhārata
GE07mbh_10_u:008.017c: nidrayā caiva pāñcālyo nāśakac ceṣṭituṃ tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:008.017c-0030_01: niṣpiṣya tu tato bhūmau pāñcālaṃ drauṇir ojasā
GE07mbh_10_u:008.017c-0030_03: tasya kaṇṭhe 'tha baddhvā tāṃ tvaritaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.017c-0030_04: drauṇiḥ krūraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā pāñcālyam avadhīt tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:008.018a: tam ākramya tadā rājan kaṇṭhe corasi cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.018c-0031_01: sa vāryamāṇas tarasā balād balavatā balī
GE07mbh_10_u:008.019a: tudan nakhais tu sa drauṇiṃ nātivyaktam udāharat
GE07mbh_10_u:008.019c: ācāryaputra śastreṇa jahi mā mā ciraṃ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.019c-0032_01: evam uktvā tu vacanaṃ virarāma paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.019e: tvatkṛte sukṛtāṃl lokān gaccheyaṃ dvipadāṃ vara
GE07mbh_10_u:008.020a: tasyāvyaktāṃ tu tāṃ vācaṃ saṃśrutya drauṇir abravīt
GE07mbh_10_u:008.020c-0033_02: tasmāt tvam api vadhyas tu nṛśaṃsena nṛśaṃsakṛt
GE07mbh_10_u:008.020e: tasmāc chastreṇa nidhanaṃ na tvam arhasi durmate
GE07mbh_10_u:008.021a: evaṃ bruvāṇas taṃ vīraṃ siṃho mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.022c: abudhyanta mahārāja striyo ye cāsya rakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.023c: bhūtam eva vyavasyanto na sma pravyāharan bhayāt
GE07mbh_10_u:008.024c: adhyatiṣṭhat sa tejasvī rathaṃ prāpya sudarśanam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.025a: sa tasya bhavanād rājan niṣkramyānādayan diśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.025c: rathena śibiraṃ prāyāj jighāṃsur dviṣato balī
GE07mbh_10_u:008.026c: saha tai rakṣibhiḥ sarvaiḥ praṇedur yoṣitas tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:008.028a: tāsāṃ tu tena śabdena samīpe kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.028c: kṣipraṃ ca samanahyanta kim etad iti cābruvan
GE07mbh_10_u:008.029a: striyas tu rājan vitrastā bhāradvājaṃ nirīkṣya tam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.030a: rākṣaso vā manuṣyo vā nainaṃ jānīmahe vayam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.030c: hatvā pāñcālarājaṃ yo ratham āruhya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_10_u:008.031a: tatas te yodhamukhyās taṃ sahasā paryavārayan
GE07mbh_10_u:008.031c: sa tān āpatataḥ sarvān rudrāstreṇa vyapothayat
GE07mbh_10_u:008.032a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca hatvā sa tāṃś caivāsya padānugān
GE07mbh_10_u:008.033a: tam apy ākramya pādena kaṇṭhe corasi caujasā
GE07mbh_10_u:008.034a: yudhāmanyus tu saṃprāpto mattvā taṃ rakṣasā hatam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.034c: gadām udyamya vegena hṛdi drauṇim atāḍayat
GE07mbh_10_u:008.035a: tam abhidrutya jagrāha kṣitau cainam apātayat
GE07mbh_10_u:008.036a: tathā sa vīro hatvā taṃ tato 'nyān samupādravat
GE07mbh_10_u:008.036c: saṃsuptān eva rājendra tatra tatra mahārathān
GE07mbh_10_u:008.036e: sphurato vepamānāṃś ca śamiteva paśūn makhe
GE07mbh_10_u:008.039a: yodhān aśvān dvipāṃś caiva prācchinat sa varāsinā
GE07mbh_10_u:008.040a: visphuradbhiś ca tair drauṇir nistriṃśasyodyamena ca
GE07mbh_10_u:008.042a: ye tv ajāgrata kauravya te 'pi śabdena mohitāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.043a: tad rūpaṃ tasya te dṛṣṭvā kṣatriyāḥ śatrukarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.044a: sa ghorarūpo vyacarat kālavac chibire tataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.045c: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ hataṃ śrutvā draupadeyā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_10_u:008.047a: bhāradvājas tu tān dṛṣṭvā śaravarṣāṇi varṣataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.047c: nanāda balavan nādaṃ jighāṃsus tān sudurjayān
GE07mbh_10_u:008.050a: tataḥ sa naraśārdūlaḥ prativindhyaṃ tam āhave
GE07mbh_10_u:008.050c: kukṣideśe 'vadhīd rājan sa hato nyapatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_10_u:008.051a: prāsena viddhvā drauṇiṃ tu sutasomaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_10_u:008.051c-0036_01: prāsaprahāraṃ tu tadā vigṛhya drauṇir āhave
GE07mbh_10_u:008.052a: sutasomasya sāsiṃ tu bāhuṃ chittvā nararṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.053c: dorbhyām utkṣipya vegena vakṣasy enam atāḍayat
GE07mbh_10_u:008.054a: atāḍayac chatānīkaṃ muktacakraṃ dvijas tu saḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.054c: sa vihvalo yayau bhūmiṃ tato 'syāpāharac chiraḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.055c: abhidrutya tato drauṇiṃ savye sa phalake bhṛśam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.056a: sa tu taṃ śrutakarmāṇam āsye jaghne varāsinā
GE07mbh_10_u:008.056c: sa hato nyapatad bhūmau vimūḍho vikṛtānanaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.057a: tena śabdena vīras tu śrutakīrtir mahādhanuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.059a: tato bhīṣmanihantā taṃ saha sarvaiḥ prabhadrakaiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.059e: śilīmukhena cāpy enaṃ bhruvor madhye samārdayat
GE07mbh_10_u:008.061e: yac ca śiṣṭaṃ virāṭasya balaṃ tac ca samādravat
GE07mbh_10_u:008.062a: drupadasya ca putrāṇāṃ pautrāṇāṃ suhṛdām api
GE07mbh_10_u:008.062c: cakāra kadanaṃ ghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.063a: anyān anyāṃś ca puruṣān abhisṛtyābhisṛtya ca
GE07mbh_10_u:008.066a: svapne suptān nayantīṃ tāṃ rātriṣv anyāsu māriṣa
GE07mbh_10_u:008.066c: dadṛśur yodhamukhyās te ghnantaṃ drauṇiṃ ca nityadā
GE07mbh_10_u:008.067c: tataḥ prabhṛti tāṃ kṛtyām apaśyan drauṇim eva ca
GE07mbh_10_u:008.068a: tāṃs tu daivahatān pūrvaṃ paścād drauṇir nyapātayat
GE07mbh_10_u:008.069a: tad anusmṛtya te vīrā darśanaṃ paurvakālikam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.071a: so 'cchinat kasya cit pādau jaghanaṃ caiva kasya cit
GE07mbh_10_u:008.071c: kāṃś cid bibheda pārśveṣu kālasṛṣṭa ivāntakaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.073a: krośatāṃ kim idaṃ ko 'yaṃ kiṃ śabdaḥ kiṃ nu kiṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.073c: evaṃ teṣāṃ tadā drauṇir antakaḥ samapadyata
GE07mbh_10_u:008.075c: nidrāndhā naṣṭasaṃjñāś ca tatra tatra nililyire
GE07mbh_10_u:008.077a: tato rathaṃ punar drauṇir āsthito bhīmanisvanam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.077c: dhanuṣpāṇiḥ śarair anyān preṣayad vai yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.078a: punar utpatataḥ kāṃś cid dūrād api narottamān
GE07mbh_10_u:008.079c: śaravarṣaiś ca vividhair avarṣac chātravāṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.081a: tathā sa śibiraṃ teṣāṃ drauṇir āhavadurmadaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.082a: utpetus tena śabdena yodhā rājan vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.082c: nidrārtāś ca bhayārtāś ca vyadhāvanta tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.082c-0039_01: vikrośaṃ cukruśuś cānye bahubaddhaṃ tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.083c: na ca sma pratipadyante śastrāṇi vasanāni ca
GE07mbh_10_u:008.084c: utpatantaḥ pare bhītāḥ ke cit tatra tathābhraman
GE07mbh_10_u:008.084e: purīṣam asṛjan ke cit ke cin mūtraṃ prasusruvuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.085a: bandhanāni ca rājendra saṃchidya turagā dvipāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.085c: samaṃ paryapataṃś cānye kurvanto mahad ākulam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.086a: tatra ke cin narā bhītā vyalīyanta mahītale
GE07mbh_10_u:008.088a: sa śabdaḥ prerito rājan bhūtasaṃghair mudā yutaiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.088c: apūrayad diśaḥ sarvā divaṃ cāpi mahāsvanaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.089c: muktāḥ paryapatan rājan mṛdnantaḥ śibire janam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.090c: akaroc chibire teṣāṃ rajanyāṃ dviguṇaṃ tamaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.091a: tasmiṃs tamasi saṃjāte pramūḍhāḥ sarvato janāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.091c: nājānan pitaraḥ putrān bhrātṝn bhrātara eva ca
GE07mbh_10_u:008.092a: gajā gajān atikramya nirmanuṣyā hayā hayān
GE07mbh_10_u:008.093a: te bhagnāḥ prapatantaś ca nighnantaś ca parasparam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.094a: vicetasaḥ sanidrāś ca tamasā cāvṛtā narāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.095a: tyaktvā dvārāṇi ca dvāḥsthās tathā gulmāṃś ca gaulmikāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.096a: vipranaṣṭāś ca te 'nyonyaṃ nājānanta tadā vibho
GE07mbh_10_u:008.097a: palāyatāṃ diśas teṣāṃ svān apy utsṛjya bāndhavān
GE07mbh_10_u:008.098a: hāhākāraṃ ca kurvāṇāḥ pṛthivyāṃ śerate pare
GE07mbh_10_u:008.100a: tāṃs tu niṣpatatas trastāñ śibirāñ jīvitaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.101c: vepamānān kṣitau bhītān naiva kāṃś cid amuñcatām
GE07mbh_10_u:008.102a: nāmucyata tayoḥ kaś cin niṣkrāntaḥ śibirād bahiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.102c: kṛpasya ca mahārāja hārdikyasya ca durmateḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.103a: bhūyaś caiva cikīrṣantau droṇaputrasya tau priyam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.105a: kāṃś cid āpatato vīrān aparāṃś ca pradhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.106a: kāṃś cid yodhān sa khaḍgena madhye saṃchidya vīryavān
GE07mbh_10_u:008.109a: sāyudhān sāṅgadān bāhūn nicakarta śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_10_u:008.109c: hastihastopamān ūrūn hastān pādāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_10_u:008.110c: samāsādyākarod drauṇiḥ kāṃś cic cāpi parāṅmukhān
GE07mbh_10_u:008.111a: madhyakāyān narān anyāṃś cicchedānyāṃś ca karṇataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.112a: evaṃ vicaratas tasya nighnataḥ subahūn narān
GE07mbh_10_u:008.113a: kiṃ cit prāṇaiś ca puruṣair hataiś cānyaiḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.113c: bahunā ca gajāśvena bhūr abhūd bhīmadarśanā 10,008.114a<>yakṣarakṣaḥsamākīrṇe
GE07mbh_10_u:008.115a: mātṝr anye pitṝn anye bhrātṝn anye vicukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.115c: ke cid ūcur na tat kruddhair dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ kṛtaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_10_u:008.116a: yat kṛtaṃ naḥ prasuptānāṃ rakṣobhiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.116c: asāṃnidhyād dhi pārthānām idaṃ naḥ kadanaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.117a: na devāsuragandharvair na yakṣair na ca rākṣasaiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.117c: śakyo vijetuṃ kaunteyo goptā yasya janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.118c: na ca suptaṃ pramattaṃ vā nyastaśastraṃ kṛtāñjalim
GE07mbh_10_u:008.118e: dhāvantaṃ muktakeśaṃ vā hanti pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.119a: tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ ghoraṃ rakṣobhiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.119c: iti lālapyamānāḥ sma śerate bahavo janāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.120a: stanatāṃ ca manuṣyāṇām apareṣāṃ ca kūjatām
GE07mbh_10_u:008.120c: tato muhūrtāt prāśāmyat sa śabdas tumulo mahān
GE07mbh_10_u:008.122c: nyapātayan narān kruddhaḥ paśūn paśupatir yathā
GE07mbh_10_u:008.123c: saṃlīnān yudhyamānāṃś ca sarvān drauṇir apothayat
GE07mbh_10_u:008.124a: dahyamānā hutāśena vadhyamānāś ca tena te
GE07mbh_10_u:008.125a: tasyā rajanyās tv ardhena pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.131a: pītvā ca śoṇitaṃ hṛṣṭāḥ prānṛtyan gaṇaśo 'pare
GE07mbh_10_u:008.131c: idaṃ varam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ svādv iti cābruvan
GE07mbh_10_u:008.133a: vasāṃ cāpy apare pītvā paryadhāvan vikukṣilāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.134a: ayutāni ca tatrāsan prayutāny arbudāni ca
GE07mbh_10_u:008.135c: sametāni bahūny āsan bhūtāni ca janādhipa
GE07mbh_10_u:008.136e: pāṇinā saha saṃśliṣṭa ekībhūta iva prabho
GE07mbh_10_u:008.137a: sa niḥśeṣān arīn kṛtvā virarāja janakṣaye
GE07mbh_10_u:008.138a: yathāpratijñaṃ tat karma kṛtvā drauṇāyaniḥ prabho
GE07mbh_10_u:008.138c: durgamāṃ padavīṃ kṛtvā pitur āsīd gatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.140a: niṣkramya śibirāt tasmāt tābhyāṃ saṃgamya vīryavān
GE07mbh_10_u:008.140c: ācakhyau karma tat sarvaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ saṃharṣayan vibho
GE07mbh_10_u:008.141a: tāv apy ācakhyatus tasmai priyaṃ priyakarau tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:008.142a: evaṃvidhā hi sā rātriḥ somakānāṃ janakṣaye
GE07mbh_10_u:008.144a: prāg eva sumahat karma drauṇir etan mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.145a: atha kasmād dhate kṣatre karmedaṃ kṛtavān asau
GE07mbh_10_u:008.145c: droṇaputro maheṣvāsas tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_10_u:008.146a: teṣāṃ nūnaṃ bhayān nāsau kṛtavān kurunandana
GE07mbh_10_u:008.146c: asāṃnidhyād dhi pārthānāṃ keśavasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.147c: na hi teṣāṃ samakṣaṃ tān hanyād api marutpatiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.148a: etad īdṛśakaṃ vṛttaṃ rājan suptajane vibho
GE07mbh_10_u:008.149a: paryaṣvajat tato drauṇis tābhyāṃ ca pratinanditaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.149c: idaṃ harṣāc ca sumahad ādade vākyam uttamam
GE07mbh_10_u:008.150a: pāñcālā nihatāḥ sarve draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:008.150c: somakā matsyaśeṣāś ca sarve vinihatā mayā
GE07mbh_10_u:008.151a: idānīṃ kṛtakṛtyāḥ sma yāma tatraiva māciram
GE07mbh_10_u:008.151c: yadi jīvati no rājā tasmai śaṃsāmahe priyam
GE07mbh_10_u:009.001a: te hatvā sarvapāñcālān draupadeyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:009.001c: agacchan sahitās tatra yatra duryodhano hataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:009.002a: gatvā cainam apaśyaṃs te kiṃ cit prāṇaṃ narādhipam
GE07mbh_10_u:009.006e: aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:009.007c: śuśubhe saṃvṛto rājā vedī tribhir ivāgnibhiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:009.008a: te taṃ śayānaṃ saṃprekṣya rājānam atathocitam
GE07mbh_10_u:009.008c: aviṣahyena duḥkhena tatas te rurudus trayaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:009.009a: tatas te rudhiraṃ hastair mukhān nirmṛjya tasya ha
GE07mbh_10_u:009.012a: iyam enaṃ gadā śūraṃ na jahāti raṇe raṇe
GE07mbh_10_u:009.012c: svargāyāpi vrajantaṃ hi na jahāti yaśasvinam
GE07mbh_10_u:009.013c: śayānāṃ śayane dharme bhāryāṃ prītimatīm iva
GE07mbh_10_u:009.014a: yo vai mūrdhāvasiktānām agre yātaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:009.014c: sa hato grasate pāṃsūn paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_10_u:009.015a: yenājau nihatā bhūmāv aśerata purā dviṣaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:009.015c: sa bhūmau nihataḥ śete kururājaḥ parair ayam
GE07mbh_10_u:009.016a: bhayān namanti rājāno yasya sma śatasaṃghaśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:009.017a: upāsata nṛpāḥ pūrvam arthahetor yam īśvaram
GE07mbh_10_u:009.017c: dhik sadyo nihataḥ śete paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_10_u:009.017c-0041_01: tam upāsyanty araṇye 'dya mṛgagomāyavaḥ sma ha
GE07mbh_10_u:009.017c-0042_01: upāsate ca taṃ hy adya kravyādā māṃsahetavaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:009.020c: balinaḥ kṛtino nityaṃ sa ca pāpātmavān nṛpa

GE07mbh_10_u:011.021a: ity uktvā pāṇḍavaṃ kṛṣṇā rājānaṃ cārudarśanā
GE07mbh_10_u:011.022a: trātum arhasi māṃ bhīma kṣatradharmam anusmaran

GE07mbh_10_u:012.011a: tatas tadā kuruśreṣṭha vanasthe tvayi bhārata

GE07mbh_10_u:012.012c: eka ekaṃ samāgamya mām uvāca hasann iva
GE07mbh_10_u:012.013a: yat tad ugraṃ tapaḥ kṛṣṇa caran satyaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:012.014c: tad adya mayi dāśārha yathā pitari me tathā
GE07mbh_10_u:012.015a: asmattas tad upādāya divyam astraṃ yadūttama
GE07mbh_10_u:012.015c: mamāpy astraṃ prayaccha tvaṃ cakraṃ ripuharaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_10_u:012.016a: sa rājan prīyamāṇena mayāpy uktaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:012.017c: na samā mama vīryasya śatāṃśenāpi piṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:012.018a: idaṃ dhanur iyaṃ śaktir idaṃ cakram iyaṃ gadā
GE07mbh_10_u:012.018c: yad yad icchasi ced astraṃ mattas tat tad dadāni te
GE07mbh_10_u:012.019a: yac chaknoṣi samudyantuṃ prayoktum api vā raṇe
GE07mbh_10_u:012.019c: tad gṛhāṇa vināstreṇa yan me dātum abhīpsasi
GE07mbh_10_u:012.020c: vavre cakraṃ mahābāho spardhamāno mayā saha
GE07mbh_10_u:012.021a: gṛhāṇa cakram ity ukto mayā tu tadanantaram
GE07mbh_10_u:012.021e: na caitad aśakat sthānāt saṃcālayitum acyuta
GE07mbh_10_u:012.023a: tataḥ sarvabalenāpi yac caitan na śaśāka saḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:012.023e: kṛtvā yatnaṃ paraṃ śrāntaḥ sa nyavartata bhārata
GE07mbh_10_u:012.024a: nivṛttam atha taṃ tasmād abhiprāyād vicetasam
GE07mbh_10_u:012.025a: yaḥ sa devamanuṣyeṣu pramāṇaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:012.027a: yasmāt priyataro nāsti mamānyaḥ puruṣo bhuvi
GE07mbh_10_u:012.027c: nādeyaṃ yasya me kiṃ cid api dārāḥ sutās tathā
GE07mbh_10_u:012.028c: noktapurvam idaṃ vākyaṃ yat tvaṃ mām abhibhāṣase
GE07mbh_10_u:012.030c: sanatkumāras tejasvī pradyumno nāma me sutaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:012.031a: tenāpy etan mahad divyaṃ cakram apratimaṃ mama
GE07mbh_10_u:012.031c: na prārthitam abhūn mūḍha yad idaṃ prārthitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_10_u:012.032c: na gadena na sāmbena yad idaṃ prārthitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_10_u:012.033c: noktapūrvam idaṃ jātu yad idaṃ prārthitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_10_u:012.034a-0060_01: dhāraṇe na samarthas tvaṃ kutaḥ kṣeptuṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_10_u:012.034c: cakreṇa rathināṃ śreṣṭha kiṃ nu tāta yuyutsase
GE07mbh_10_u:012.035a: evam ukto mayā drauṇir mām idaṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE07mbh_10_u:012.035c: prayujya bhavate pūjāṃ yotsye kṛṣṇa tvayety uta
GE07mbh_10_u:012.036c: ajeyaḥ syām iti vibho satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_10_u:012.038a: etat sunābhaṃ vṛṣṇīnām ṛṣabheṇa tvayā dhṛtam
GE07mbh_10_u:012.039a: etāvad uktvā drauṇir māṃ yugyam aśvān dhanāni ca

GE07mbh_10_u:013.009c: prādurāsīn mahāñ śabdaḥ pakṣiṇāṃ patatām iva
GE07mbh_10_u:013.012a: sa teṣāṃ prekṣatām eva śrīmatāṃ dṛḍhadhanvinām
GE07mbh_10_u:013.012e: yatra sma śrūyate drauṇiḥ putrahantā mahātmanām
GE07mbh_10_u:013.015a: tam abhyadhāvat kaunteyaḥ pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ

GE07mbh_10_u:013.017e: sa tām āpadam āsādya divyam astram udīrayat
GE07mbh_10_u:014.002a: arjunārjuna yad divyam astraṃ te hṛdi vartate
GE07mbh_10_u:014.003c: visṛjaitat tvam apy ājāv astram astranivāraṇam
GE07mbh_10_u:014.004c: avātarad rathāt tūrṇaṃ pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:014.005c: bhrātṛbhyaś caiva sarvebhyaḥ svastīty uktvā paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:014.006c: utsasarja śivaṃ dhyāyann astram astreṇa śāmyatām
GE07mbh_10_u:014.007a: tatas tad astraṃ sahasā sṛṣṭaṃ gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
GE07mbh_10_u:014.009a: nirghātā bahavaś cāsan petur ulkāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:014.009c: mahad bhayaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ samajāyata
GE07mbh_10_u:014.011a: te astre tejasā lokāṃs tāpayantī vyavasthite

GE07mbh_10_u:014.012a: nāradaḥ sa ca dharmātmā bharatānāṃ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:014.014c: āstām ṛṣivarau tatra jvalitāv iva pāvakau
GE07mbh_10_u:014.016c: naitad astraṃ manuṣyeṣu taiḥ prayuktaṃ kathaṃ cana

GE07mbh_10_u:015.002a: uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭhas tāv ṛṣī prāñjalis tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:015.002c: prayuktam astram astreṇa śāmyatām iti vai mayā
GE07mbh_10_u:015.004a: atra yad dhitam asmākaṃ lokānāṃ caiva sarvathā
GE07mbh_10_u:015.005a: ity uktvā saṃjahārāstraṃ punar eva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:015.005c: saṃhāro duṣkaras tasya devair api hi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_10_u:015.006c: na śaktaḥ pāṇḍavād anyaḥ sākṣād api śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:015.008c: tad astraṃ sānubandhasya mūrdhānaṃ tasya kṛntati
GE07mbh_10_u:015.009a: brahmacārī vratī cāpi duravāpam avāpya tat
GE07mbh_10_u:015.011a: drauṇir apy atha saṃprekṣya tāv ṛṣī purataḥ sthitau
GE07mbh_10_u:015.011c: na śaśāka punar ghoram astraṃ saṃhartum āhave
GE07mbh_10_u:015.015a: ataḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ brahman mayāstram akṛtātmanā
GE07mbh_10_u:015.015c: tasya bhūyo 'dya saṃhāraṃ kartuṃ nāham ihotsahe
GE07mbh_10_u:015.016a: visṛṣṭaṃ hi mayā divyam etad astraṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_10_u:015.018a: kṛtaṃ pāpam idaṃ brahman roṣāviṣṭena cetasā
GE07mbh_10_u:015.018c: vadham āśāsya pārthānāṃ mayāstraṃ sṛjatā raṇe
GE07mbh_10_u:015.019a: astraṃ brahmaśiras tāta vidvān pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:015.019c: utsṛṣṭavān na roṣeṇa na vadhāya tavāhave
GE07mbh_10_u:015.020a: astram astreṇa tu raṇe tava saṃśamayiṣyatā
GE07mbh_10_u:015.021a: brahmāstram apy avāpyaitad upadeśāt pitus tava
GE07mbh_10_u:015.022c: sabhrātṛbandhoḥ kasmāt tvaṃ vadham asya cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_10_u:015.023c: samā dvādaśa parjanyas tad rāṣṭraṃ nābhivarṣati
GE07mbh_10_u:015.024c: na vihanty etad astraṃ te prajāhitacikīrṣayā
GE07mbh_10_u:015.025a: pāṇḍavās tvaṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca sadā saṃrakṣyam eva naḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:015.025c: tasmāt saṃhara divyaṃ tvam astram etan mahābhuja
GE07mbh_10_u:015.026a: aroṣas tava caivāstu pārthāḥ santu nirāmayāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:015.026c: na hy adharmeṇa rājarṣiḥ pāṇḍavo jetum icchati
GE07mbh_10_u:015.027a: maṇiṃ caitaṃ prayacchaibhyo yas te śirasi tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_10_u:015.027c: etad ādāya te prāṇān pratidāsyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:015.028a: pāṇḍavair yāni ratnāni yac cānyat kauravair dhanam
GE07mbh_10_u:015.029c: devebhyo dānavebhyo vā nāgebhyo vā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_10_u:015.030a: na ca rakṣogaṇabhayaṃ na taskarabhayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_10_u:015.030c: evaṃvīryo maṇir ayaṃ na me tyājyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_10_u:015.031a: yat tu me bhagavān āha tan me kāryam anantaram
GE07mbh_10_u:015.031c: ayaṃ maṇir ayaṃ cāham iṣīkā nipatiṣyati
GE07mbh_10_u:015.031c-0065_01: na ca śakto 'smi bhagavan saṃhartuṃ punar udyatam
GE07mbh_10_u:015.031c-0065_02: etad astram ataś caiva garbheṣu visṛjāmy aham
GE07mbh_10_u:015.031c-0065_03: na ca vākyaṃ bhagavato na kariṣye mahāmune

GE07mbh_10_u:015.033a: tataḥ paramam astraṃ tad aśvatthāmā bhṛśāturaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:015.033c-0067_01: tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ hite rataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:015.033c-0067_02: bhaviṣyam ekam utsṛjya garbheṣv astraṃ nipātyatām

GE07mbh_10_u:016.001c: hṛṣyamāṇa idaṃ vākyaṃ drauṇiṃ pratyabravīt tadā

GE07mbh_10_u:016.008c: sa tu garbho mṛto jāto dīrgham āyur avāpsyati

GE07mbh_10_u:016.008c-0069_02: yady astradagdhaṃ govinda jīvayasy evam astv iti
GE07mbh_10_u:016.009a: tvāṃ tu kāpuruṣaṃ pāpaṃ viduḥ sarve manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:016.010a: tasmāt tvam asya pāpasya karmaṇaḥ phalam āpnuhi
GE07mbh_10_u:016.010e: aprāpnuvan kva cit kāṃ cit saṃvidaṃ jātu kena cit

GE07mbh_10_u:016.016c: brāhmaṇasya sataś caiva yasmāt te vṛttam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_10_u:016.017a: tasmād yad devakīputra uktavān uttamaṃ vacaḥ

GE07mbh_10_u:016.018c: satyavāg astu bhagavān ayaṃ ca puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:016.019c: jagāma vimanās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ paśyatāṃ vanam

GE07mbh_10_u:016.031a: vairasya gatam ānṛṇyaṃ na sma vācyā vivakṣatām
GE07mbh_10_u:016.031c: jitvā mukto droṇaputro brāhmaṇyād gauraveṇa ca

GE07mbh_10_u:016.034a: taṃ gṛhītvā tato rājā śirasy evākarot tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:016.034c: guror ucchiṣṭam ity eva draupadyā vacanād api
GE07mbh_10_u:016.035a: tato divyaṃ maṇivaraṃ śirasā dhārayan prabhuḥ

GE07mbh_10_u:017.001a: hateṣu sarvasainyeṣu sauptike tai rathais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:017.001c: śocan yudhiṣṭhiro rājā dāśārham idam abravīt
GE07mbh_10_u:017.002c: drauṇinā nihatāḥ sarve mama putrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:017.004a: yasya droṇo maheṣvāso na prādād āhave mukham
GE07mbh_10_u:017.004c: taṃ jaghne rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ kathaṃ nu saḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:017.005a: kiṃ nu tena kṛtaṃ karma tathāyuktaṃ nararṣabha

GE07mbh_10_u:017.006c: jagāma śaraṇaṃ drauṇir ekas tenāvadhīd bahūn
GE07mbh_10_u:017.007a: prasanno hi mahādevo dadyād amaratām api
GE07mbh_10_u:017.007c: vīryaṃ ca giriśo dadyād yenendram api śātayet
GE07mbh_10_u:017.008c: yāni cāsya purāṇāni karmāṇi vividhāny uta
GE07mbh_10_u:017.009a: ādir eṣa hi bhūtānāṃ madhyam antaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_10_u:017.009c: viceṣṭate jagac cedaṃ sarvam asyaiva karmaṇā
GE07mbh_10_u:017.010a: evaṃ sisṛkṣur bhūtāni dadarśa prathamaṃ vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:017.013a: so 'bravīt pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśaṃ magnam ambhasi
GE07mbh_10_u:017.013c: yadi me nāgrajas tv anyas tataḥ srakṣyāmy ahaṃ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:017.014a: tam abravīt pitā nāsti tvad anyaḥ puruṣo 'grajaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:017.014c: sthāṇur eṣa jale magno visrabdhaḥ kuru vai kṛtim
GE07mbh_10_u:017.015a: sa bhūtāny asṛjat sapta dakṣādīṃs tu prajāpatīn
GE07mbh_10_u:017.015c: yair imaṃ vyakarot sarvaṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidham
GE07mbh_10_u:017.016a: tāḥ sṛṣṭamātrāḥ kṣudhitāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ prajāpatim
GE07mbh_10_u:017.017c: ābhyo māṃ bhagavān pātu vṛttir āsāṃ vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_10_u:017.018a: tatas tābhyo dadāv annam oṣadhīḥ sthāvarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_10_u:017.019a: vihitānnāḥ prajās tās tu jagmus tuṣṭā yathāgatam
GE07mbh_10_u:017.020a: bhūtagrāme vivṛddhe tu tuṣṭe lokagurāv api

GE07mbh_10_u:017.021a: bahurūpāḥ prajā dṛṣṭvā vivṛddhāḥ svena tejasā
GE07mbh_10_u:017.021c: cukrodha bhagavān rudro liṅgaṃ svaṃ cāpy avidhyata
GE07mbh_10_u:017.022a: tat praviddhaṃ tadā bhūmau tathaiva pratyatiṣṭhata

GE07mbh_10_u:018.004c: tarasā bhāgam anvicchan dhanur ādau sasarja ha

GE07mbh_10_u:018.008a: tataḥ kruddho mahādevas tad upādāya kārmukam
GE07mbh_10_u:018.009c: vivyathe pṛthivī devī parvatāś ca cakampire

GE07mbh_10_u:018.011a: na babhau bhāskaraś cāpi somaḥ śrīmuktamaṇḍalaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:018.012a: abhibhūtās tato devā viṣayān na prajajñire
GE07mbh_10_u:018.012c: na pratyabhāc ca yajñas tān vedā babhraṃśire tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:018.013a: tataḥ sa yajñaṃ raudreṇa vivyādha hṛdi patriṇā
GE07mbh_10_u:018.013c: apakrāntas tato yajño mṛgo bhūtvā sapāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:018.014a: sa tu tenaiva rūpeṇa divaṃ prāpya vyarocata
GE07mbh_10_u:018.015a: apakrānte tato yajñe saṃjñā na pratyabhāt surān
GE07mbh_10_u:018.015c: naṣṭasaṃjñeṣu deveṣu na prajñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_10_u:018.016a: tryambakaḥ savitur bāhū bhagasya nayane tathā
GE07mbh_10_u:018.016c: pūṣṇaś ca daśanān kruddho dhanuṣkoṭyā vyaśātayat
GE07mbh_10_u:018.017a: prādravanta tato devā yajñāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:018.017c: ke cit tatraiva ghūrṇanto gatāsava ivābhavan
GE07mbh_10_u:018.018a: sa tu vidrāvya tat sarvaṃ śitikaṇṭho 'vahasya ca
GE07mbh_10_u:018.019a: tato vāg amarair uktā jyāṃ tasya dhanuṣo 'cchinat
GE07mbh_10_u:018.019c: atha tat sahasā rājaṃś chinnajyaṃ visphurad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:018.020c: śaraṇaṃ saha yajñena prasādaṃ cākarot prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:018.021a: tataḥ prasanno bhagavān prāsyat kopaṃ jalāśaye
GE07mbh_10_u:018.021c: sa jalaṃ pāvako bhūtvā śoṣayaty aniśaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_10_u:018.022a: bhagasya nayane caiva bāhū ca savitus tathā
GE07mbh_10_u:018.022c: prādāt pūṣṇaś ca daśanān punar yajñaṃ ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_10_u:018.023a: tataḥ sarvam idaṃ svasthaṃ babhūva punar eva ha
GE07mbh_10_u:018.023c: sarvāṇi ca havīṃṣy asya devā bhāgam akalpayan
GE07mbh_10_u:018.024a: tasmin kruddhe 'bhavat sarvam asvasthaṃ bhuvanaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_10_u:018.024c: prasanne ca punaḥ svasthaṃ sa prasanno 'sya vīryavān
GE07mbh_10_u:018.025a: tatas te nihatāḥ sarve tava putrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:018.025c: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrāḥ pāñcālāś ca sahānugāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:018.026a: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ na hi tad drauṇinā kṛtam 10,018.026c<>mahādevaprasādaḥ sa kuru kāryam anantaram
